name: Demand Forecasting - Data Scientist App
description: Detecting time series patterns and forecasting using Prophet and SARIMAX models

appStages.name: Introduction
appStages.stageDetails:
{ "components": [ { "label": "HTML", "attrs": [ { "attr": "", "value": "" } ], "content": "

Demand Forecasting Poultry Model Building App

Overview

This app supports data scientists in building a robust demand forecasting model for poultry products using store and item-level quantity sold data. The dataset includes date, store, item, and sales quantity. It includes data preprocessing, time-based aggregation, and model training using Facebook Prophet. The app is designed to streamline the workflow from raw sales data to validated forecasting insights by enabling end-to-end experimentation and performance evaluation.

Key Features

  • + Ingests raw sales data with fields: Date, Store, Item, and Sales Quantity.
  • + Performs preprocessing by typecasting date fields and aggregating data from daily to monthly level.
  • + Implements time-series forecasting using Prophet on four years of historical data per store.
  • + Enables data scientists to validate model accuracy using hold-out test data (one year).
  • + Offers model performance metrics and visual outputs for each SKU-store combination.

Key Insights

  • + Seasonality and trend decomposition show distinct cyclical demand for poultry items.
  • + Monthly forecasting identifies peak and low demand periods, aiding supply planning.
  • + Store-level trends help isolate location-specific patterns in poultry consumption.
  • + Model error metrics (e.g., MAPE, RMSE) assist in evaluating and tuning forecasting accuracy.
", "refreshOnChange": false, "key": "html", "type": "htmlelement", "input": false, "tableView": false }, { "label": "Get Started", "action": "event", "showValidations": false, "theme": "info", "rightIcon": "fa fa-arrow-right", "customClass": "btn-outline mt-0 float-right", "tableView": false, "key": "getStarted", "type": "button", "event": "next", "input": true } ] }

appStages.name: Model-Training
Model-Validation
appStages.stageDetails:
{"components":[{"label":"HTML","attrs":[{"attr":"","value":""}],"content":"

Demand Forecasting Model Validation

Guide To Using The App

  • + Data Upload: Start by uploading your dataset, ensuring it's in a compatible format like CSV or Excel.
  • + Model Selection: Choose suitable models for your analysis from the available options provided by the app.
  • + Running Models and Performance Evaluation: Initiate the analysis, run the selected models, and review the performance metrics generated by the app for assessing model effectiveness.

Feature Columns & Their Description

FIELD NAME DESCRIPTION
Product CategoryThe identifier or name of the Product Category where the item was sold.
Product NameThe identifier or name of the item sold
Total_Quantity_SoldThe total quantity of the item sold in the sales transaction.

      "content": "\u003cdiv style\u003d\"border-radius: 5px; font-family: Roboto;margin:-30px -18px 15px -18px\"\u003e\r\n    \u003cdiv style\u003d\"padding: 0.75rem 1.1rem; background-color: #fff;\r\n        border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(30, 30, 30, 0.125); \r\n        border-top-right-radius: 5px; border-top-left-radius: 5px; \r\n        color: #ffffff;\"\u003e\r\n        \u003ch3 style\u003d\"color: #023E8A; font-size: 28px; margin-left: 0px;font-weight: 400;\"\u003eDemand Forecasting Predictive Analysis\u003c/h3\u003e\r\n     \u003c/div\u003e\r\n\t \u003cdiv style\u003d\"margin-top:20px;\"\u003e         \u003c/div\u003e\r\n         \u003c/div\u003e\r\n         \u003cdiv style\u003d\"margin-top: 20px;\"\u003e \r\n                  \u003cdiv style\u003d\"margin-top: 20px;\"\u003e\r\n             \u003ch4 style\u003d\"color: #3178d6\"\u003eGuide To Using The App\u003c/h4\u003e\r\n            \u003cul style\u003d\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0; font-size: 16px; margin-top: 10px;\"\u003e\r\n                \u003cli style\u003d\"display: flex; align-items: center; margin-bottom: 10px;\"\u003e\r\n                    \u003cspan style\u003d\"width: 13px; height: 13px; background-color: #ADE8F2 !important; color: #FFFFFF; \r\n                        border-radius: 50%; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; \r\n                        font-size: 12px; font-weight: bold; margin-right: 10px;\"\u003e+\u003c/span\u003eClick on the Predictive Analysis to get the monthly avg sales for actual and predicted data\u003c/li\u003e\r\n            \u003cul style\u003d\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0; font-size: 16px; margin-top: 10px;\"\u003e\r\n                \u003cli style\u003d\"display: flex; align-items: center; margin-bottom: 10px;\"\u003e\r\n                    \u003cspan style\u003d\"width: 13px; height: 13px; background-color: #ADE8F2 !important; color: #FFFFFF; \r\n                        border-radius: 50%; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; \r\n                        font-size: 12px; font-weight: bold; margin-right: 10px;\"\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e                   Click on the Get Gen AI Report button to get the Future Forecasting for 12 moinths\u003c/li\u003e\r\n            \u003cul style\u003d\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0; font-size: 16px; margin-top: 10px;\"\u003e\r\n                \u003cli style\u003d\"display: flex; align-items: center; margin-bottom: 10px;\"\u003e\r\n                    \u003cspan style\u003d\"width: 13px; height: 13px; background-color: #ADE8F2 !important; color: #FFFFFF; \r\n                        border-radius: 50%; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; \r\n                        font-size: 12px; font-weight: bold; margin-right: 10px;\"\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e                   It will give you the Gen AI report as well for all the items\u003c/li\u003e\r\n             \u003c/ul\u003e\r\n         \u003c/div\u003e\r\n         \u003c/div\u003e\r\n         \u003cdiv class\u003d\"mt-3\"\u003e\r\n  \u003ch4 class\u003d\"bg-success rounded p-3\" style\u003d\"color:#fff\"\u003eFeature Columns \u0026 Their Description\u003c/h4\u003e\r\n \u003cdiv style\u003d\"height:200px;overflow:auto;margin-top:-9px;border:1px solid #cdcdcd;border-bottom-left-radius: 5px;border-bottom-right-radius: 5px;\"\u003e\r\n\u003ctable class\u003d\"table table-sm\"\u003e\r\n  \u003cthead\u003e\r\n    \u003ctr class\u003d\"table-success\"\u003e\r\n      \u003cth scope\u003d\"col\"\u003eFIELD NAME\u003c/th\u003e\r\n      \u003cth scope\u003d\"col\"\u003eDESCRIPTION\u003c/th\u003e\r\n    \u003c/tr\u003e\r\n  \u003c/thead\u003e\r\n  \u003ctbody class\u003d\"small\"\u003e\r\n     \u003ctr\u003e\r\n      \u003ctd\u003eProduct Category\u003c/td\u003e\r\n      \u003ctd\u003eThe identifier or name of the Product Category where the item was sold.\u003c/td\u003e\r\n    \u003c/tr\u003e\r\n     \u003ctr\u003e\r\n      \u003ctd\u003eProduct Name\u003c/td\u003e\r\n      \u003ctd\u003eThe identifier or name of the item sold\u003c/td\u003e\r\n    \u003c/tr\u003e\r\n     \u003ctr\u003e\r\n      \u003ctd\u003eTotal_Quantity_Sold\u003c/td\u003e\r\n      \u003ctd\u003eThe total quantity of the item sold in the sales transaction.\u003c/td\u003e\r\n    \u003c/tr\u003e\r\n  \u003c/tbody\u003e\r\n\u003c/table\u003e\r\n\u003c/div\u003e\r\n\u003c/div\u003e",
